title: feat: hidden model support, remove Claude fallbacks, add claude-legacy
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Introduced support for hidden models in the registry and added accessible legacy versions for Claude and Gemini.
gist.impact: Developers can now access specific legacy model versions via API calls without cluttering the main public model list.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee opening a secret glowing chest containing old data scrolls in a magical archive. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'Legacy Access'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
